Package android.support.v17.leanback.supportleanbackshowcase.app

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CheckDeviceActivity
    This class is the first activity launched when the app is first opened to check either the device is an Android TV or not.
    LeanbackActivity
    This class is the parent activity to other activity classes in this project to receive and send the RGYB button input when available to its child class currently in display.
    MainActivity
    This class is started by CheckDeviceActivity when the current device is an Android TV.
    MainFragment  
    MainFragment.FragmentHome
    Fragment for the default landing page (Home).
    MainFragment.FragmentLiveBroadcast
    Fragment for category Live TV Channels.
    MainFragment.FragmentLoginSignUp
    Fragment for Login and Sign-up menu.
    MainFragment.FragmentMovie
    Fragment for category Movies.
    MainFragment.FragmentNewsSports
    Fragment for category Nesw & Sports.
    MainFragment.FragmentTvShow
    Fragment for category TV Shows.
    MainFragment.SettingsFragment
    Fragment for Settings menu.
